mapper.select: SELECT CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , PDCT_PD_CD , SV_PD_CD , IST_DT , REQD_DT , CPS_DT , CNTR_NMN_N , UPDT_PSIC_DV_CD , BC_NO , WK_PSIC_DV_CD , MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD , MNGT_PRTNR_NO FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND rownum<=41

SELECT AS_IST_OJ_NO , CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , CNTR_CST_NO , IN_CHNL_DV_CD , SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , RCP_OG_TP_CD , RCP_ICHR_PRTNR_NO , RCPDT , FNL_RCPDT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND rownum<=41
